shippingCalculator.description: a valid key for the available calculator types

eligibleForProductWithSurcharges.description: whether this shipping method is enabled for products with surcharges or not.

isExternallyPriced.description: Whether this shipping method can be priced externally or not. Defaults to false.

ranges.description: the price ranges for this shipping method

high.description: the upper boundary of the range

amount.description: The value for the range in selected price list group

secondaryCurrencyShippingAmount.description: The value for the range in monetary currency. In case of mix currency, if payShippingInSecondaryCurrency flag is set to true and the secondaryCurrencyCode is set at site, this amount will be calculated according to the exchange rate defined between selected priceListGroup's currency code and site's secondary currency code

low.description: the lower boundary of the range

repositoryId.description: the repository id of this priceRange item

displayName.description: the display name for the shipping method given the current locale.

type.description: The type property of the shipping method.

taxCode.description: a valid tax code for calculating tax on shipping.

enabled.description: whether this shipping method is enabled or not.

displaySequence.description: used to determine the ordering of shipping methods in the UI. Lower values should appear first in any ordered list.

repositoryId.description: the id of the shipping method item

isFallback.description: Use this shipping method when Commerce Cloud cannot connect to an external shipping service. Defaults to false.

shipToLocations.description: The array of repository IDs of shipping locations.
